<<<<<<< HEAD
The art of rhetoric, with A discourse of the laws of England by Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury. Art of rhetoric Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
[6], 168, 208 p.
Printed for William Crooke ..., London : 1681.
"A dialogue between a phylosopher and a student, of the common-laws of England" has separate collation. "The art of rhetorick plainly set forth, with pertinent examples" (p. [135]-168) has special t.p. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
